home.freeDesc: Use all features for free with no file limits.

imageConverter.title: Image Converter
imageConverter.description: Convert various image formats including PNG, JPG, WebP, HEIC

features.heicDesc: Easily convert HEIC files from iPhone to JPG or PNG.
features.qualityDesc: Adjust image quality from 1-100% to balance file size and quality.
features.batchDesc: Upload multiple images and convert them all with the same settings.
features.webpDesc: Convert to modern WebP format to optimize website performance.

howToUse.title: Image Format Converter
howToUse.description: Easily convert various image formats including PNG, JPG, WebP, HEIC. All processing is done in your browser for privacy.
howToUse.step1Desc: Drag or click to select image files to convert. You can upload multiple files at once.
howToUse.step2Desc: Choose the output format (JPG, PNG, WebP) and image quality.
howToUse.step3Desc: Click convert and download individually or all at once when complete.

faq.a1: HEIC is a high-efficiency image format used by Apple since iOS 11. It has smaller file sizes than JPG with the same quality.
faq.q2: How should I choose quality settings?
faq.a2: For web images, 70-80% is recommended. For printing or preserving originals, use 90-100%.
faq.a3: Maximum 100MB per file, up to 10 files at once.

imageEditor.description: Crop, rotate, flip, resize, and optimize images

howToUse.title: Image Editor
howToUse.description: A free online image editor supporting crop, rotate, flip, resize, and optimize. All processing is done in your browser.
howToUse.step1Desc: Drag or click to select an image file to edit.
howToUse.step2Desc: Use the toolbar to crop, rotate, flip, resize, or optimize your image.
howToUse.step3Desc: When done editing, download the result image.

gifMaker.title: GIF Maker

howToUse.title: GIF Maker
howToUse.description: Create animated GIFs from multiple images. Easily make GIF animations with adjustable speed and size.
howToUse.step1Desc: Add images in sequence to create an animation. Drag to reorder.
howToUse.step2Desc: Set frame delay (speed) and output size.
howToUse.step3Desc: Click create and download your animated GIF.

howToUse.title: Video Converter
howToUse.description: Convert videos to GIF, GIF to MP4 video, or extract frames from videos. All processing is done in your browser using FFmpeg WebAssembly.
howToUse.step1Desc: Choose Video to GIF, GIF to Video, or Extract Frames.
howToUse.step2Desc: Upload a video or GIF file to convert.
howToUse.step3Desc: Adjust FPS, scale, format, then convert and download.

howToUse.title: URL Generator
howToUse.description: Convert images and videos to shareable URLs. Choose Base64 for embedding, Blob for temporary use, or Cloud for permanent sharing.
howToUse.step1Desc: Upload an image or video file to generate a URL.
howToUse.step2Desc: Choose Base64, Blob, or Cloud Storage based on your needs.
